review: It's a wonderful thought of creating this app. Hats off you guys. Bringing all the designers from around the world into one place. I found many creative designs, illustrations and photos from this. The quality of the image is so good. The one flaw that i found is there is no search option, couldn't type the keywords and filter it easily. Could you please fix it. Overall it's a best app to get creative images.

I absolutely love the app... It's not only a treasure trove of amazing wallpapers but is also a platform for artists to portray their works and express themselves. You can have any number of wallpapers in your playlist, you just will have to watch an ad after 10, or you could upgrade. Honestly, I don't find the ads that annoying because they're pretty short. And the artwork is really stunning. It's like an Instagram for wallpapers (you can like photos and follow your favourite artists).

In a word, awesome! I purchased the premium right away. Fell in love with the collections! Lots of artists are there, their artworks are sooo damn good! I just can't express how much lucky I am to found this gold. Some improvements are needed in terms of functionality like, 1. Multiple playlists, 2. Rather than removing artworks from playlist 1 by 1, I wish there's an option for selecting multiple files, 3. Frequency can be brought down to seconds like 30 secs.

I really like the app especially due to its playlist feature, but still I would have liked to have: 1. More of natural pictures. Here most of the wallpapers are created by artists and natural photographs of scenic beauty are very few. 2. I could upload my own collection to playlist. ( While adding them to playlist there should be an option for proper cropping so that wallpapers do not get stretched).

This is an amazing app. It solves a problem I didn't know that I had, that was looking at the same wallpaper everyday. The playlist feature is by far the most unique and useful feature I've seen on any app. The ability to have multiple playlists and add one's own images onto their playlists from the device gallery would settle it as a 5-star experience. Love what you're doing, keep it upüëç
ras4vb: Hi, Rektify Gaming. Thank you for your kind words about our app. We work hard to deliver a great app, and are happy to receive positive feedback! We hope you continue being a loyal user. Please reach out with any suggestions. If you love the app, please consider changing your rating to 5 stars. Thanks, -Anne.

review: Walli is by far the best wallpaper app, just certain features can be added to make the experience a whole lot better. 1. Please add an option or category where I could find all the artworks from all the artists I am following together. Right now I could only visit their profiles to get it but it if all the followed artist's artworks are available at a single place in any sequence it would be great. 2. I so wish to find pitch black dark mode being available. It would make the experience superb.

To be honest, this app is not THE BEST wallpaper app. But surely, have some additional perks and features. Like the quality of wallpapers is amazing but you have to he selective. And also the live wallpaper play is glitchy but good! The main downside is that the wallpapers are downloaded fully for preview. No thumbnail view which is slowing the app on low connectivity. Rather the app is amazing!! üî•

Hi I was trying to download few wallpapers from the walli app. I was using the fee version of the app. But unfortunately, the wallpapers didn't get downloaded. I tried it again by closing and reopening the app. But things did not work out. Kindly look into it. After many attempts to download, I finally uninstalled the app. I have written an email also, but I don't know why, I started receiving random emails, of those issues which I never encountered. Like payment issues, like app crash etc
ras4vb: Hi, Ayush. Sorry to hear you are disappointed with the app. We welcome you to send more detailed feedback to support@tap.pm, as we are continuously working to improve and greatly value customer feedback. Thanks, -Anne

review: Love the app. I have a suggestion for UX, being a premium user who loves the playlist feature. Please either keep the 3 dots in a more reachable location like above the artist image, or add a button for quickly adding an artwork to a playlist. Right now it's 2-step process and it's a bit uncomfortable to reach the top right corner of the phone screen. 5 star when this problem is solved.
ras4vb: Hi, Anurag. Thank you for your rating and kind words about our app. We work hard to deliver a great app experience, and are happy to receive feedback like this! We hope you continue being a loyal user and please reach out with any suggestions. If you love the app, please consider changing your rating to 5 stars. Thanks, -Anne

review: This app is amazing so far. It's understandable and very cool. To elaborate, what it does is if you like a particular photo then converts and previews it as a wallpaper that is normal. But what it does is it gives you two options such as which way you'd like to download it the optimised or the complete one . Which is cool and haven't seen it before in other apps. So kudos Shanga. Loved the app.

Best wallpaper app I've ever used. It has beautiful, high quality wallpapers which you can download to your phone gallery (which many apps won't allow) and can use even after deleting the app. The app also supports dark mode. The number of wallpapers if large enough, but there is not much variety in the categories.So, I didn't get the wallpaper that I was looking for, but I am impressed with what I got.

This is one of the best wallpaper apps out there and I love the playlist feature too...can you add the selection of a particular image in a playlist, play in order or shuffle play just like music controls. That would complete the playlist feature for me... [Note: There's a bug as the playlist images automatically fails to cycle in the given time interval]

Just pick the wallpapers that you like, and they take turns being your wallpaper, with a custom interval before switching. There's also a pause option if you like to freeze a wallpaper for as long as you like. It's as simple and clear and satisfying as that. Glad I found this app!! Neat work guys. Could improve the collection a little though.

This application is a beautiful one, that gives artists, and aspiring artists to create and recreate, advertise and showcase their work, even earn off of it. Coming to the application usage, it is user friendly, straightforward, smooth operations, but has scope to improve on the existing options that we have already, which eventually is improved through the regular updates.

I am one of those person who feels the need to change his wallpapers frequently, and so i need a good app for it. Came across Walli, and the experience on offer is genuinely unmatched, plus it also offers credit to the artists. The wallpapers are well categorised and tagged, and the collection itself is stunning. Its everything i could have asked for and more. Cheers developers

Great app for a variety of wallpapers. It's more than just wallpapers basically. One will know who created them and follow the artists and get to see more of their work. It's just so satisfying to see such amazing pictures, sketches, portrays and graphics and so much more all at one place. Totally loved it ! üòç

Great app. Love the new dark theme, but when you download an image, the pop up page saying "downloading" is completely white. Just make that dark too please. Reduced 2 stars for the opening "subscribe to pro" page. I don't have a problem with pro versions, it's just the way your app opens, it very easy for people to accidentally click the trial button (which automatically charges after 3 days). Had to delete it from my sisters phone incase she accidentally purchased it.
ras4vb: Hi, Pravar. We regret to hear about your negative experience with our app. We are happy to hear details about what you think can be improved. Please reach out at support@tap.pm

review: Wow! The best and least cluttered app of all time! It has ads and all but they are not annoying at all. And most of all the wallpapers are so good!! Theres something for everyone! Video games movies,foodie,humour everything!! Also I have a suggestion- would be cool to have a feature that let's you set random apps daily!

Good wallpapers. Good features. Downloading options available. You can contribute and can showcase your art as well (unlike some other apps where its allowed, but you're ignored). The only problem I faced was that the queue to apply as an artist was full. Hope they allow fast and in-bulk entries for interested people.
ras4vb: Hi Krishn, Thank you for your feedback. Please contact us at support@tap.pm, we‚Äôd like to hear more about what you‚Äôd like to see in our app. Thanks, -Emma.

review: I've been using this app for years and I am a premium member of it too. The UI change is so bad. Please bring back the old one. The new one looks like some kid wanted the app to look cool. I want that quick button to add any wallpaper to my Playlist. Till another update comes, I'll be using another wallpaper app, even if I have to see some ads there. Walli has become unusable for me.
ras4vb: Hi, Jay. Sorry to hear you are disappointed with the app. We welcome you to send more detailed feedback to support@tap.pm, as we are continuously working to improve and greatly value customer feedback. Thanks, -Anne

review: I used to put walli wallpapers all the time. Never had to look for an alternative. Even paid for premium. One day out of nowhere the premium plan switched to subscription. It was raining ads. This was a place i came to after deleting instagram for the artists. But hey, a business got to make money right? And i have to move on a better platform. Oh and thanks btw i almost forgot.
ras4vb: Hi, Sorry to hear you are disappointed with the app. We welcome you to send more detailed feedback to support@tap.pm, as we are continuously working to improve and greatly value customer feedback. Thanks, -Anne

review: Though this app has good set of wallpapers. It is very poorly designed! There are so many ads just so many ads! Come on! Plus it asked me select few wallpapers before logging in, it then saved a play list of those. Once I logged in all my selected wallpapers were gone! Are you kidding? I took so much time to select those wallpapers in my Playlist and after logging in you remove them? Ohh and yes the auto wallpaper change does not work on the oneplus 7.

The app is great. All wallpapers and features are nice. But I have an issue, when I set a wallpaper, the wallpaper appearing on Home screen is cropped and it feels zoomed towards the centre of wallpaper. This kind of removes the fun part. It will be great if you will fix it. Thanks for the service.

Arguably it's the best wallpaper app available in play store. I love and appreciate wallpaper apps that just don't list a bunch of wallpaper but categorises them based on style. It also gives due credits to the artists and allows us to follow the artist whose work we love the most. That's a really a nice incentive.

I really enjoy this app and it has worked really well for me but since I upgraded to an s22 ultra it'll only work for about a day before the Playlist will pause itself again and I have to restart it. The selection of art is pretty good and the premium is cheap. And you can upload your own images into your Playlist which is so nice. Just wish I didn't have to restart it all the time.
ras4vb: Hi, Devin. Thank you for your rating and kind words about our app. We work hard to deliver a great app experience, and are happy to receive feedback like this! We hope you continue being a loyal user and please reach out with any suggestions. If you love the app, please consider changing your rating to 5 stars. Thanks, -Anne.

review: Way too restricting. Without premium your options are super limited. It only lets you have a few pictures you can rotate through and even if you make more than 1 playlist it won't let you actually play them. I tried swapping pictures out so I could change things up but again it's restricted. I don't mind having to wait a little to add more to my playlist but just not being able to kinda sucks. If you don't want to pay for premium don't get this app.
ras4vb: Hi, Sarah. We regret to hear you were dissatisfied. The free version of the app displays ads and limits capabilities. The paid pro version will allow an ad-free experience, unlimited downloads and playlist functionalities. You can experience the full potential of the pro version with a free trial before committing. Thanks, -Anne

review: Broken app, and I need to find a replacement. It's terrible. I regret buying the premium, but the basic app is so neutered I had to give it a shot. There's some really good art on here. The feature to automatically update your wall paper every few minutes hasn't worked in over a year. I set the playlist to run, but it never done.
ras4vb: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience using the app. We take feedback to heart and integrate it into future updates, which will surely create a better experience for you. Please contact us at support@tap.pm, we‚Äôd like to hear more about the issue you encountered. Thanks, -Anne.

review: After about an hour my collection stops rotating automatically. I have to go in and manually restart it rotating, if I want. It's set to rotate every 30 mins but it gets stuck somehow. It's irritating. Otherwise this is one of my favorite apps, so it's frustrating not to be able to give it 5 stars.
ras4vb: Hi, Nancy. Sorry to hear you are disappointed with the app. We welcome you to send more detailed feedback to support@tap.pm, as we are continuously working to improve and greatly value customer feedback. Thanks, -Anne

review: Only just started using this but so far it's pretty great for a free app. Very easy to use, there's lots of free background images that are stunningly beautiful, and it's very easy to set them as a home or lock screen background. There are ads to deal with but they're not terribly intrusive. This is exactly meeting my needs.

I've tried out more wallpaper apps than I care to admit and this one is by far my most favorite! Especially considering how it's free to use, is compatible w/almost every phone out there, and truly has the greatest selection of the most beautifully eclectic and intensely eye catching images out there!!! Thanks again for making this by far Best downloadable wallpaper app out there to date!

Rich image base. 2 stars for numerous bugs and missing features: wallpapers are not cycling in random order, but cycle through a set of same images; the app stops working after several days (this is not related to deep sleep). Those issues are not addressed since Feb 2020. The app is VERY buggy. E.g., as of Sep 2022, I get notifications to follow the app on instagram over and over again.
ras4vb: Hello we've released a fix - please update to V537 and check again

review: I enjoyed the app, bought premium, but now seems abandoned, no new wallpapers, nor updates for months. The app scrolling is not smooth and after few minutes scrolling feels very sluggish. Also when you apply a wallpaper to see how it looks, you go back and the scrolling restarts making you scroll through tons of pictures again.

BY FAR THE ü•áüèÖBEST WALLPAPER APP! I've experienced no glitches, Huge selection , Well catergorized, My liked images are saved in my profile, Able to read artist bio and interact with artist, No problem downloading and setting image to lock screen or home screen, Can make a playlist ... And more... and all this for FREE!!

Free trial worked great. Now I am reverted to the ad version, the app keeps crashing when trying to apply a new wallpaper on my home screen/lock screen. I've sent a crash report from my Android device with crash logs. Please fix this issue.
ras4vb: Hi, Matthew. Sorry to hear you are disappointed with the app. We welcome you to send more detailed feedback to support@tap.pm, as we are continuously working to improve and greatly value customer feedback. Thanks, -Anne

review: I love this app! There wallpaper on here is much higher quality than similar apps. There's usually an ad after each download which of course is pesky, but if I'm too cheap to buy premium, the least I could do is watch their ads for access to these beautiful images!

Watch an advert for downloading an wallpaper? Each and every time? No thanks. Also the app is not optimized for 120 fps. Crashes randomly. There are lots of other better options out there. Uninstalling now...
ras4vb: Hi. Sorry to hear you are disappointed with the app. We welcome you to send more detailed feedback to support@tap.pm, as we are continuously working to improve and greatly value customer feedback. Thanks, -Anne

review: Beautiful. . .when it works. . .it rotates about 10 wallpapers then stops for some reason. I have to restart the app and start the process via the play button. . .outside of that, it's a great app with a large variety of beautiful high res wallpapers to fit any phone.
ras4vb: Hi, Sean. Thank you for your rating and kind words about our app. We work hard to deliver a great app experience, and are happy to receive feedback like this! We hope you continue being a loyal user and please reach out with any suggestions. If you love the app, please consider changing your rating to 5 stars. Thanks, -Anne.

review: So far I am loving this app. It has the best wallpapers I have ever seen. I would definitely recommend this app as it has a vast variety of wallpapers, they are ordered in categories. The ads on this app don't pop up frequently and they are appropriate ads. Overall this is a great application to have on your phone if you're looking for high quality wallpapers.

Along with Backdrops this is my favourite wallpaper app. Loading times for wallpapers are instant and any ads that pop up, as you're downloading your chosen wallpaper, are at most 5 seconds long and easily skipped at the end. Hats off for the massive selection and the quality. A joy to use

Great wallpapers, but I find the instructions are difficult for me to follow. I open my app about once per month to swap my wallpaper. I have to reacquaint myself with the instructions which takes twice as long as creating a playlist.
